Remember.Commentary: We 've asked that You train them. It has not been done as an act of war, it has been done as act of obedience to You. There are still people to be saved. A talent is a bloody thing to waste. LORD, continue to love, Yourself. May be the next generation can see things in a different way, given the opportunity. LORD, God for this is Your time on earth. We have agreed for You to bury Your dead. That I may fulfill Your will. Their is a glory ... For the time has come to fulfill Your will.

AlphabetSequence.Word: Tell them I love them, and Me, I will come for them.

CaseBasedReasoning.Commentary: Wake-up Orientation: Feets cross, hands crossed at the elbow. What should I tell the little ones? Tell them I love them, and Me, I will come for them. Shower. Count the 13 Kokuho Rice re-located from the left towards the right on 20031010. Left finger twitches. Kokuho Rice U.S. #1 Extra Fancy New Crop Net Wt. 20LBS 9.07kg.

ClassAssociates.Commentary: Shutdown the left computer, Comfort ... Comfort computer noise. Shutdown the left computer, Comfort ... Comfort computer noise. Wake-up, turn on the computer, shower, garage noise, smell.
